sentence.Network_en: Outer perianth segments dark brownish - red, short lanceolate, with whitish edge.
sentence.Network_cn: 外花被片段为深棕红色, 短披针形, 带白色边缘.

sentence.Network_en: The outer series of perianth in the irises and related plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 蝴蝶花或相关植物外层常垂的花瓣.

sentence.Network_en: Located below the perianth and other floral parts. Used of an ovary.
sentence.Network_cn: 下位的位于花被和其它部分以下的.用于指子房.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French périanthe, from modern Latin perianthium, from Greek peri 'around' + anthos 'flower'

means.word_mean: 1. collective term for the outer parts of a flower consisting of the calyx and corolla and enclosing the stamens and pistils
